DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the treatment effect of montelukast versus placebo over a 2 week period in patients with seasonal allergic rhinitis. Loratadine is included in the study as an active comparator.
DOC.brief_title: Montelukast in Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis - Spring 2001 Study (0476-235)
DOC.criteria: Patient has a documented history of season allergic rhinitis symptoms that flare up during the study season Patient is a nonsmoker Patient is in good general health Patient is hospitalized Patient is a woman who is <8 weeks postpartum or is breastfeeding Patient has had major surgery in the past 4 weeks Patient intends to move or vacation away during the study Patient is a current or past abuser of alcohol or illicit drugs
